name: SkullUserbot
description: A Simple Cool Telethon Userbot for Telegram users made with fun and Hardwork. Made by @mayank1rajput and for support join @skulluserbot .

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name or Username.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Create a private group add rose  then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Create a private group add rose bot then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for gitcommit plugin.Google 'Github access token' to find.

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Your repo name Example: SKULLUB/SkullUserbot, but GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN must be setup first.

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot.Worth it. Get it.

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the username of your bot

DOWNLOAD_PFP_URL_CLOCK.description: Needed for autopic module. A url that is a preview link of your Profile Pic

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic
